statements: SELECT * FROM mediation_records;
SELECT record_id, session_date, mediator_name FROM mediation_records WHERE session_duration > 60;
SELECT participant1_name, participant2_name, outcome_description FROM mediation_records WHERE session_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM mediation_records ORDER BY session_date DESC;
SELECT mediator_name, COUNT(*) as sessions_count FROM mediation_records GROUP BY mediator_name ORDER BY sessions_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM mediation_records ORDER BY session_date DESC, session_duration ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT participant1_name, participant2_name, mediator_name FROM mediation_records WHERE session_duration > 60 ORDER BY session_duration DESC;
SELECT session_date, mediator_name, outcome_description FROM mediation_records WHERE participant1_name LIKE 'J%' OR participant2_name LIKE 'K%' ORDER BY session_date ASC;
SELECT session_duration, participant1_name, participant2_name FROM mediation_records WHERE session_duration > 30 AND session_duration < 60 ORDER BY session_duration ASC;
SELECT * FROM mediation_records WHERE participant1_name = 'Alice' AND mediator_name = 'Bob';
SELECT * FROM mediation_sessions;
SELECT session_id, date, mediator FROM mediation_sessions ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM mediation_outcomes WHERE result = TRUE;
SELECT session_id, outcome FROM mediation_outcomes WHERE outcome ILIKE '%agreement%';
SELECT * FROM mediation_sessions WHERE location = 'Virtual';
SELECT * FROM mediation_sessions WHERE mediator='John Doe';
SELECT session_id, date, location FROM mediation_sessions WHERE date >= '2021-10-01';
SELECT session_id, mediator, location FROM mediation_sessions ORDER BY mediator DESC;
SELECT session_id, mediator, JSON_ARRAY_LENGTH(participants) AS participants_count FROM mediation_sessions;
SELECT s.session_id, o.outcome FROM mediation_sessions s INNER JOIN mediation_outcomes o ON s.session_id = o.session_id WHERE o.result = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM mediation_sessions;
SELECT mediator_name, date FROM mediation_sessions WHERE mediator_name='John Smith';
SELECT session_id, date, mediator_name FROM mediation_sessions ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM mediation_outcomes WHERE resolution='successful';
SELECT mediator_name, specialty FROM mediators ORDER BY mediator_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM mediation_sessions WHERE mediator_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT session_id, date FROM mediation_sessions WHERE date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT mediator_name, COUNT(*) FROM mediation_sessions GROUP BY mediator_name ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT * FROM mediation_outcomes JOIN mediation_sessions ON mediation_outcomes.session_id = mediation_sessions.session_id;
SELECT mediator_name, specialty FROM mediators WHERE mediator_name LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY mediator_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM mediation_sessions;
SELECT session_id, mediator_id, client_id, session_date FROM mediation_sessions WHERE session_duration > '1 hour';
SELECT mediator_name, mediator_license FROM mediators WHERE mediator_id = '63f73625-cadc-4f30-9edc-bb6b455b3c01';
SELECT client_name, client_contact FROM clients WHERE client_id = 'bba7f015-12bb-4f4f-b3b1-a1299e65e021';
SELECT session_id, outcome_description, outcome_date FROM outcomes ORDER BY outcome_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM mediation_sessions;
SELECT mediator_name, mediator_license FROM mediators WHERE mediator_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT client_name, client_contact FROM clients WHERE client_contact LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT session_id, session_date, session_duration FROM mediation_sessions ORDER BY session_date DESC;
SELECT outcome_description, outcome_date FROM outcomes WHERE outcome_date >= '2023-01-01' AND outcome_date <= '2023-12-31';
SELECT * FROM mediation_sessions WHERE session_id = 1;
SELECT mediator_name, start_time, end_time FROM mediation_sessions WHERE start_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT participant_name, role FROM participants WHERE role = 'Lawyer';
SELECT feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE participant_id = 3;
SELECT document_id, document_name FROM documents WHERE document_type = 'Agreement';
SELECT * FROM mediation_sessions;
SELECT session_id, mediator_name, start_time FROM mediation_sessions WHERE location = 'Conference Room 1';
SELECT participant_name, role FROM participants WHERE role = 'Lawyer' ORDER BY participant_name DESC;
SELECT outcome_description FROM outcomes WHERE session_id = 1001 OR session_id = 1002;
SELECT document_name, document_type FROM documents WHERE session_id = 1003 AND document_type = 'Agreement';
